text: "Bed" is a pop song by Nicki Minaj featuring Ariana Grande, released on June 14, 2018. It is from Minaj's fourth studio album Queen. This marks the fourth collaboration between the two. ==References== Category:Nicki Minaj songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:2018 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs about sexuality
title: Bed (Nicki Minaj song)
